name: accpi
description: Hello all! This is a little project which is meant to be a rip off of OAuth from google. It's just meant to be a universal way to log into whatever app you have made on WebX. It supports creating and logging into accounts, to access and to RW a persons data (such as a password change, giving or taking coins, etc...) and will hopefully enable a system which doesn't require you to make a new account for every WebX app you meet, but just log in with those very same credentials you use for everything aswell!
